given.text:
I worked directly with Chuck for slightly over a year in a software development capacity. Chuck was the individual who helped me acclimate to the group and its practices when I first joined. I quickly came to respect his thoroughness in his work and his willingness to help the rest of the team.

Chuck consistently proposed improvements to practice methodologies while we worked together. I can honestly attribute many of the group's process improvements to Chuck's ingenuity.

I can wholeheartedly recommend Chuck for any positions that he may seek in the future. See less
